data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nieto Nafría, Juan M., Aldea, Marta, Castro, Marta (2015): A new species of Acyrthosiphon (Hemiptera, Aphididae) from France and Spain. Zootaxa 3919 (2): 335-342, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3919.2.6
